title: Far-seeing Eyes (1C43)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time you play an Elf, choose an opponent to discard a card from hand.
Lore:	Keen Elven eyes see farther and more clearly than those of Men or Dwarves.
Rarity:	C
Notes:	Erratum: This Elven condition is unique.
